member.name: MIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE_EX
member.summary: The MIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE_EX structure contains a table of extended statistics for Multicast Forwarding Entries (MFEs).

member.name: MIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE_EX.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of MFEs in the array.

member.name: MIB_MFE_STATS_TABLE_EX.table
member.summary: A pointer to a table of MFEs that are implemented as an array of structures.
